import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container,Row,Col, From,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetail = () => { /* const {id} = useParams() //this is an static data later we will call our API and load our data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) //destructure properties from tour object const {photo,title,desc,price,reviews,city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour return (

{title}
)*/ } export default TourDetail
